articles.title: Who Was Gangubai Kathiawadi: The Woman Alia Bhatt Will Portray In Her Latest Film - NDTV
articles.description: Actress Alia Bhatt will next been seen in Gangubai Kathiawadi, in which she will play the titular role. Gangubai Kathiawadi is based on the life of Gangubai Kathewali, a brothel owner in Mumbai's Kamathipura area.
